Title: Authorizes the combination of certain petit larceny charges
Summary: Provides that a person who has previously been subjected to two or more petit larceny convictions within 18 months immediately preceding the charge and the aggregate value of the property exceeds one thousand dollars, the person is guilty of grand larceny in the fourth degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to allowing prosecutors to combine certain charges
